site.name: Dominique E. Thomas
site.footerNote: Fractional HR executive and trusted advisor

home.heroHeadline: People decisions that protect your business and your culture
home.heroSubhead: Fractional HR leadership for founders and business leaders navigating employee relations, multistate compliance, and scalable people systems.
home.credHeadline: Executive level HR, without the overhead
home.credBody:
Most people decisions are not hard because leaders lack values. They are hard because the facts are incomplete, the rules are complex, and the consequences are real.

For nearly two decades, I have advised founders and business leaders across more than 250 organizations, from growing startups to complex multistate employers. I serve as a fractional HR executive and trusted advisor, providing senior level HR leadership without the need for a full time hire.

If you are expanding across states, navigating a high stakes employee matter, or building the people foundation your growth requires, let’s talk. A brief conversation is often enough to clarify what matters most and determine the right next step.

home.expertiseHeadline: Practical support that holds up in real organizations
home.expertiseBody: My work sits at the intersection of organizational development, employee relations, and scalable people infrastructure that supports growth and helps employees thrive. I strengthen multistate compliance, reduce risk, and help leaders make informed decisions grounded in quality information and a clear understanding of tradeoffs.

about.headline: Your steady HR presence when it matters most
about.body:
Most people decisions are not hard because leaders lack values. They are hard because the facts are incomplete, the rules are complex, and the consequences are real.

For nearly two decades, I have advised founders and business leaders across more than 250 organizations, from growing startups to complex multistate employers. I serve as a fractional HR executive and trusted advisor, providing senior level HR leadership without the need for a full time hire.

My work sits at the intersection of organizational development, employee relations, and scalable people infrastructure that supports growth and helps employees thrive. I strengthen multistate compliance, reduce risk, and help leaders make informed decisions grounded in quality information and a clear understanding of tradeoffs. I also build the systems that allow organizations to scale with confidence, including policies, performance management, learning and development, manager tools, and practical workflows that hold up in real organizations.

If you are expanding across states, navigating a high stakes employee matter, or building the people foundation your growth requires, let’s talk. A brief conversation is often enough to clarify what matters most and determine the right next step.
